title: TANZANITE GEMSTONE USES | Crystal Meaning - Psychic Visions
cleaned_text:
Considered an uncommon stone, this is a Psychic Crystal that unblocks the brow and crown chakras to allow the clear flow of psychic energy (especially the brow). It allows us to link with angels and beings of higher vibration.

Although some forms are clear to yellow or brown, it is the beautiful blue and purple that is the most healing. It is also known as a Stone of Transformation.A highly metaphysical stone known for its beauty in jewelry such as rings. The blue stones will work more with communication whilst the lilac purple as very psychic stones.Good for use in meditation, it allows one to access higher vibrations, these being very spiritual. As a spiritual stone, it imbues one with compassion and patience, whilst uplifting the mind.It can be used to calm the wearer, and aid in finding solutions to difficult problems. Is said to be good for empaths.Can open us clairvoyantly to see visions.This stone is transformative and helps to heal to past, inspiring us with renewed inspiration.Good for clearing the throat and lungs, and help alleviate conditions of the skin, ears and eyes.Good also for the immune system, and general healing after illness.Detoxifies and regenerates tissues on a cellular level. Try it for any spinal or reproductive issues. Also good for headaches.The only source of this crystal is from Tanzania in east Africa (recently discovered in 1967).
